To: Carpenter ° McKinney Blair King Leigh hunt - Barclay (Long, Haymes & Carr) ’ Bethea - W. Lawson 6 £ 29 8090S
summary: To:  ‘Barclay (Long, Haymes & Carr)’ ‘Bethea -                                 W. Lawson. ’ To: “Carpenter °˚McKinney                ˙                ”. To the end of the letter, the author wrote to the firm, asking for £29.6.
